footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Kaeya | Update Date: 08/28/2022 | Editor: Luno#1337

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Mistsplitter Reforged__
Best-in-Slot weapon on Kaeya in freeze teams for its strong weapon passive and stat spread in freeze.  
** **

fields.name: Replacement Weapon:
fields.value:
__Amenoma Kageuchi, Cursed Blade__
Strong F2P weapons that perform well. Amenoma helps to reduce his ER requirements significantly while Cursed Blade is an option as an attack stat stick. 

__Harbinger of Dawn__
Niche weapon that can be fairly strong with its CRIT DMG stat and CIRT Rate passive ( >90% HP, which can be easily maintained in a freeze team )
However, the low base attack can make other weapon option precede HoD’s large crit stats; best to check optimizer to be sure. 

__Favonius Sword__
Supportive weapon that works best when Kaeya is primarily used as a battery for the player’s primary Cryo DPS character. 
** **

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> ATK% |<goblet>  Cryo DMG Bonus |<circlet>  CRIT DMG

fields.value:

**2)** Elemental Skill: Frostgnaw
